name: df-djaN
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cdjaN, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cfv(clh, cv(s0)), cmpo(s2, s3, cpw(cfv(cfv(cltrn, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), cpw(cfv(cfv(cltrn, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), cfv(cfv(cfv(cocaN, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cin(cfv(cfv(cfv(cocaN, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), cfv(cfv(cfv(cocaN, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cv(s3))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ vA =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(LHyp ` s0)‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà P(((LTrn ` s0)` s1)), s3 ‚àà P(((LTrn ` s0)` s1))‚Ü¶(((ocA ` s0)` s1)`((((ocA ` s0)` s1)` s2)‚ãÇ(((ocA ` s0)` s1)` s3))))))
comment: Define (closed) subspace join for ` DVecA ` partial vector space. (Contributed by NM, 6-Dec-2013.)
